select previousseq, previoussubject, adminBoard_idx, fk_adminId, name, title,content, fk_sellerName, fk_hotelName, registerday, nextseq, nextsubject , commentCount , groupno, fk_seq, depthno , fileName, orgFilename, fileSize from ( select lag(adminBoard_idx, 1) over(order by groupno desc, adminBoard_idx) as previousseq , lag(title, 1) over(order by groupno desc, adminBoard_idx) as previoussubject , adminBoard_idx, fk_adminId, name, title, content, fk_sellerName, fk_hotelName , to_char(registerday, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as registerday , lead(adminBoard_idx, 1) over(order by groupno desc, adminBoard_idx) as nextseq , lead(title, 1) over(order by groupno desc, adminBoard_idx) as nextsubject , commentCount , groupno, fk_seq, depthno , fileName, orgFilename, fileSize from tbl_here_adminBoard where status = 1 ) V where V.adminBoard_idx = #{adminBoard_idx} order by groupno desc, adminBoard_idx
